snippet.title: One Piece Dance Battle!
snippet.description: Luffy, Zoro, Nami, Hancock, Tashigi, Robin and more from One Piece have a dance battle! One Piece Dance battle is a smart phone game for Japan. In the game, players explore the world and challenge rivals to dance-offs, where they must imitate their opponent's dance moves to defeat them. The game will also have a "dance hall" mode where players can challenge each other to earn accessories and costumes.
